name: schooling

effect.sword-shield: If this Pokémon is a wishiwashi and level 20 or above, then when it enters battle and at the start of each turn, it becomes Schooling Form if its HP is 25% or higher and Solo Form otherwise. This ability cannot be replaced, copied, or nullified.
